description: An example description used to populate the initial database, note don't directly reference tag, instead use the tag_keys idx.  The database is going to use the idx generated from that composite idx, to speed up the queries.  So when searching find the tags you care about, then all tag_keys that include those tags and finally query using those idx's to ensure your queries are effiecent, otherwise I make no promises about how fast the query will execute.
An example tag used to display how historic tagging works (Don't use).
